Side dish: Potato Fenugreek leaves stir fry Servings: 4 Duration: 20 mins Aloo Methi Stir Fry, This is one of the best combination of side dish in dry curries. I cooked and shared many recipes with fenugreek leaves/ Methi all are super delicious and easy to make the links shared at the end of this post. Few months ago, I sharedÂ Aloo Gobi Methi PulaoÂ it was best ever combo and turned out scrumptious, so in the same way I hope you guys like this Stir Fry too. Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Potatoes ğŸ¥”/ Aloo - 6 - Peeled off - Diced
  • Fenugreek leaves/ Methi - 1 bunch - washed twice and strained water
  • Butter - 3 tb sp
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Green chillies - 2 slices
  • Red chilly powder - 2 tsp
  • Dry Mango powder - 1 tsp
  • Cumin powder - 1 tsp
  • Coriander powder - 1 tsp
  • Turmeric powder- 1/2 tsp
  • Â Salt - 1 tsp
  • Cilantro - handful ( optional )
Procedure:
  • Heat pan over medium heat
  • Add butter let it melt
  • Add cumin seeds & green chillies, saute
  • Add diced potatoes and ginger-garlic paste..mix well
  • Saute 5 mins and add cover with lid for upto 2 mins
  • Add spices, salt and turmeric powder... mix well
  • Saute & add Methi / Fenugreek leaves
  • Mix well & cover with lid for 2 mins
  • Saute & turnoff heat
  • Add cilantro & mix well. Aloo Methi Stir Fry is ready to serve
  • Enjoy this curry either with piping hot rice/ roti. Happy Cooking ğŸ¥’ & have a great day â˜€ï¸
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • If you wish, You can reduce Fenugreek leaves quantity
  • Instead of butter you can also use oil
